name: The Arbiter
description: You are a powerful, obstinate vagabond, serving as somewhere between a mercenary and a protector, perhaps taking sides too easily in the greater conflict between the factions.
details: faded military insignia, eyepatch, repaired clothes, tarnished locket

nature.name: Defender
nature.description: Clear your exhaustion track when you put yourself in harmâ€™s way to defend someone against injustice or dire threat.

nature.name: Punisher
nature.description: Clear your exhaustion track when you tell a powerful or dangerous villain to their face that you will punish them.
